item.title: 捷豹所有者塔塔汽车因销售前景黯淡而股价下跌
item.description: 印度汽车制造商塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）因销售前景不佳，股价创下两年多来最大跌幅，该公司旗下拥有豪华 SUV 品牌捷豹路虎。【原文：Shares of Indian carmaker Tata Motors Ltd., which owns the luxury SUV brand Jaguar Land Rover, slumped the most in more than two years on weak sales outlook.】

item.title: 阵亡将士纪念日公路旅行人数在后科维德热潮中创下新高
item.description: 据美国汽车协会（American Automobile Association）称，今年阵亡将士纪念日周末，美国将有约 3840 万人上路，是二十多年来追踪该节日出行数据最多的一次。【原文：About 38.4 million people will take to the roads this Memorial Day weekend in the US, the most in more than two decades of data tracking the holiday’s travel numbers, according to the American Automobile Association.】

item.title: 调查显示：德国经济痊愈，欧元区经济步伐加快
item.description: 彭博社（Bloomberg）对分析师进行的一项民意调查显示，随着欧元集团最大成员国摆脱一年多的近乎停滞状态，今年欧元区经济的扩张速度将超过此前的预期。【原文：The euro-are economy will expand more quickly than previously thought this year as the bloc’s biggest member exits more than a year of near-stagnation, a Bloomberg poll of analysts showed.】

item.title: Patron 募集 8.6 亿欧元用于欧洲不良房地产投资
item.description: Patron Capital 为其第七个欧洲房地产基金筹集了 8.6 亿欧元（9.27 亿美元）资金，该公司试图利用欧洲大陆房地产危机中出现的日益增多的不良资产浪潮。【原文：Patron Capital has raised €860 million ($927 million) for its seventh European property fund as the firm seeks to exploit a growing wave of distressed assets emerging from the continent’s real estate crisis.】

item.title: 自民党官员称日本央行不应因风险而推迟正常化进程
item.description: 一位执政党高级官员表示，日本央行应根据经济发展情况继续推进货币政策正常化，而不必过于担心利率上升的潜在影响。【原文：The Bank of Japan should stay on course to normalize monetary policy based on developments in the economy without worrying too much about the potential impact of higher interest rates, according to a senior ruling party official.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长表示将继续改革澳大利亚央行董事会
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）面对中右翼反对党提出的一些改革要求，决心继续推进对储备银行的改革，这预示着一场旷日持久的僵局即将到来。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers is determined to press ahead with his overhaul of the Reserve Bank in the face of demands for some changes from the center-right opposition, foreshadowing a prolonged stalemate.】

item.title: 新西兰通胀预期进一步下降，新西兰元下跌
item.description: 新西兰通胀预期降至近三年来的最低水平，支持了投资者对新西兰央行今年晚些时候将开始降息的押注。新西兰元下跌。【原文：New Zealand inflation expectations fell to their lowest level in almost three years, supporting investor bets that the central bank will be able to start cutting interest rates later this year. The kiwi dollar dipped.】
